outputs.output_descr: To promote autonomous community adaptation to climate change in Ethiopia project aims at demonstrating measures to remove barrier for the promotion of autonomous community adaptation practice in four regions of ethiopia namely  Oromia, Tigray, Benishangul Gumuz and Gambella and to chart low emission climate resilient development path ways at the Addis Ababa city administration, thorough  the approach known as territorial approach to climate change (TACC).

project_descr: Promote Autonomous Community Adaptation to Climate Change in Ethiopia Project
project_title: Promoting Autonomous Adaptation at Community level
